com.jme3.terrain

Interface ProgressMonitor


  • public interface ProgressMonitor
    Monitor the progress of an expensive terrain operation. Monitors are passed into the expensive operations, and those operations call the incrementProgress method whenever they determine that progress has changed. It is up to the monitor to determine if the increment is percentage or a unit of another measure, but anything calling it should use the setMonitorMax() method and make sure incrementProgress() match up in terms of units.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getMonitorMax()
      The max value of the progress.
      void incrementProgress(float increment)
      Increment the progress by a unit.
      void progressComplete()
      The progress has completed
      void setMonitorMax(float max)
      The max value that when reached, the progress is at 100%.

      • getMonitorMax
